content.raw:
There might be a memory leak in gzclient.  To reproduce

  1. Start gzserver and gzclient separately.
  1. Spawn PR2 robot
  1. Use topic viewer to view any published image,
  1. Memory usage of gzclient grows continuously (checked with top).
  1. Closing topic viewer does not stop the memory growth.
content.html:
There might be a memory leak in gzclient. To reproduce

  1. Start gzserver and gzclient separately.
  2. Spawn PR2 robot
  3. Use topic viewer to view any published image,
  4. Memory usage of gzclient grows continuously (checked with top).
  5. Closing topic viewer does not stop the memory growth.
